label: 押小路
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Also called Sanjō Bomon Palace. A residence used by Emperors Nijō, Juntoku, Go-Fukakusa, and others. Located in the area defined by Oshigakōji to the north, Sanjō Bōmonnokōji to the south, Kurasumarunokōji to the west, and Higashinotōin to the east. [三条坊門、二条天皇、順徳天皇、後深草天皇、烏丸小路、東桐院]
